description:
Keroro finds a strange warped crawl space that allows him to play pranks by dangling over Natsumi and Giroro`s ceilings.  Later, he has the good idea of invading by making everyone on Earth think they`re being watched constantly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Ceiling Walker / Keroro, Self-Consciousness Invasion
ケロロ 屋根裏の散歩者 であります / ケロロ 自意識過剰で侵略! であります
